title: Patch twice
body: Why do I have to patch twice? I run on a very small dsl connection and double download takes too much time, what's the reason for this?

replies.body: So sometimes if your network hits some kind of hiccup while League is patching it could miss certain files or they could become damaged in the process. When your client finally notices something is wrong, it'll start to repatch in order to make sure everything is working properly so you don't crash mid-game.
